login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Access your secure connection
login.magicLinkAlt: मैजिक लिंक से साइन इन करें

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join the secure network
register.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
register.telegramAutoRegister: आपके Telegram खाते का उपयोग त्वरित पंजीकरण के लिए किया जाएगा

logout.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out?

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.accountExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.accountNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again in {seconds} seconds
errors.rateLimitedMinutes: Too many attempts. Please try again in {minutes} minutes

errors.expired: Telegram authentication expired. Please try again
errors.notLinked: This Telegram account is not linked to any user
errors.alreadyLinked: This Telegram account is already linked to another user

telegram.botLinkExpired: Login link expired. Please request a new one from the bot.
telegram.botLinkInvalid: Invalid login link. Please try again.

oauthCallback.verifyingIdentity: आपकी पहचान सत्यापित हो रही है
oauthCallback.missingParams: OAuth पैरामीटर गायब हैं। कृपया फिर से साइन इन करें।
oauthCallback.defaultError: प्रमाणीकरण विफल। कृपया पुनः प्रयास करें।

verify.invalidOrExpired: अमान्य या समाप्त मैजिक लिंक। कृपया नया अनुरोध करें।

magicLink.orEnterCode: या ईमेल से कोड दर्ज करें

oauth.accountCreated: {provider} के माध्यम से खाता बनाया गया
